pr_title: DBZ-2277 Disable tombstones when using Google PubSub sink

timeline.message: DBZ-2277 Disable tombstones when using Google PubSub sink

timeline.bodyText: How about having a method like supportsTombstoneEvents() on the ChangeConsumer contract instead of hard-wiring this?
timeline.author: gunnarmorling

timeline.message: DBZ-2277 ChangeConsumer indicates if tombstones are to be emitted
